episodes.title: Books, Brainwashing, & Behavior
episodes.description:
⚠️Content note: This episode includes discussion of cult dynamics, religious trauma, and LGBTQ+ topics. Please listen with care if those areas are sensitive for you. 

🎙️What starts as a cozy book chat turns into a deep dive on beliefs, mindset shifts, culty brainwashing, and dating after deconstruction. We even touch on the movie Frailty — which we’ll be unpacking fully in next week’s episode 👀

This one’s honest, a little messy, and full of “oh wow, same” moments. It might also be uncomfortable for those who’ve left this particular cult or others like it. We discuss topics like homosexuality and gender identity — areas that can feel polarizing or sensitive for those deconstructing from fundamentalism.

🌀 Real talk, thoughtful reflection, and plenty of space for nuance.


#CultyConversations #DeconstructionPodcast #ReligiousTraumaRecovery #CultSurvivor #MindsetShift #FrailtyMovie #BeliefUnpacking #HealingJourney #CultyEntertainment #PopCultureAndFaith #Deprogramming #HealingOutLoud
